cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hareru

sentence.kanji: 明日は晴れるといいですね。
sentence.romaji: ashita ha hareru to ii desu ne
sentence.english: I hope it'll be sunny tomorrow.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kanji

sentence.kanji: 漢字は中国から来ました。
sentence.romaji: kanji ha chuugoku kara kimashita
sentence.english: Kanji came from China.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's haru

sentence.kanji: 今年の春は暖かいね。
sentence.romaji: kotoshi no haru ha atatakai ne
sentence.english: It's warm this spring, isn't it.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sensei

sentence.kanji: 私は日本語の先生になりたいです。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha nihongo no sensei ni naritai desu
sentence.english: I want to become a Japanese teacher.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's muzukashii

sentence.kanji: この本は難しいですね。
sentence.romaji: kono hon ha muzukashii desu ne

sentence.english: My big sister's a college student.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koukousei

sentence.english: My little brother's a high school student.

sentence.english: He's a serious student.

sentence.kanji: 彼は留学生です。

sentence.english: He's a foreign student.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ikiru

sentence.romaji: minna ishoukenmei ikite iru

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's aoi

sentence.english: The sea here is very blue.

sentence.english: Bordeau is famous for wine production.

sentence.english: Division is learned in elementary school.

sentence.english: My favorite color is blue.

sentence.kanji: 息子は中学生です。

sentence.romaji: kare ha uta de jibun no kimochi wo hyougen shita
sentence.english: He expressed his feelings in song.

sentence.english: Bicycles are a convenient form of transport.

sentence.english: My sister and her husband had a baby boy.

sentence.english: Let's care about living things.

sentence.english: I'll deduct 2000 yen from the recommended retail price.

sentence.romaji: joushaken ha nakusanai you ni
sentence.english: Do not lose the ticket.

sentence.english: A lot of students got on board at that station.

sentence.english: A huge number of people get on and off at this station.

sentence.romaji: kono basu no unchin ha jousha suru toki ni haraimasu
sentence.english: On this bus, you pay the fare when you get on.

sentence.english: Young people in the town are doing volunteer work.

sentence.kanji: 人間は理性を持つ動物です。

sentence.english: Human beings are rational animals.

sentence.english: My period started yesterday.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jishuu

sentence.romaji: kyou ha ryouri no jishuu ga ata

sentence.english: More than 80 years have passed since I came into this world.

sentence.english: I can't express this feeling well.

sentence.english: This movie is rather interesting.

sentence.romaji: shinjitsu ha hitotsu desu
sentence.english: There is one truth.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ikiikito

sentence.english: The kids are playing vigorously.

sentence.english: He produced a number of masterpieces.

sentence.romaji: kore ha totemo jitsuyouteki na saito da ne

sentence.romaji: kare no hatsumeihin ha mina jitsuyouteki da yo

sentence.english: I was given sake as a souvenir.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seizon

sentence.kanji: 乗客は全員生存しています。
sentence.romaji: joukyaku ha zenin seizon shite imasu
sentence.english: All passengers survived.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's joukyaku

sentence.kanji: 乗客の一人の具合が悪くなったの。
sentence.romaji: joukyaku no ichi nin no guai ga waruku nata no 。
sentence.english: The condition of one passenger got worse.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jitsubutsu

sentence.kanji: 何かの説明をする時は実物を使うとわかりやすいの。
sentence.romaji: nanika no setsumei wo suru toki ha jitsubutsu wo tsukau to wakari yasui no
sentence.english: When you explain something, it's easier to understand if you use the real thing.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's noridasu

sentence.kanji: 船が長い航海に乗り出したの。
sentence.romaji: fune ga nagai koukai ni noridashita no
sentence.english: The ship set out on a long sea voyage.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ishou

sentence.kanji: 一生のお願いがあります。
sentence.romaji: ishou no onegai ga arimasu
sentence.english: I have a once-in-a-lifetime favor.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's dousei

sentence.kanji: 同性の友達より異性の友達のほうが多いよ。
sentence.romaji: dousei no tomodachi yori isei no tomodachi no hou ga ooi yo
sentence.english: I have more friends of the opposite sex than I do of the same sex.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seinengapi

sentence.kanji: ここに生年月日を記入してください。
sentence.romaji: koko ni seinengapi wo kinyuu shite kudasai
sentence.english: Please fill in your date of birth here.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's aojiroi

sentence.kanji: 彼女は青白い顔をしているね。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha aojiroi kao wo shite iru ne
sentence.english: Her face is pale.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seimei

sentence.kanji: 生命は海から始まったと言われている。
sentence.romaji: seimei ha umi kara hajimata to iwarete iru
sentence.english: It is said that life started in the sea.

cards.english: to go to work, attendance at work
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shukin

sentence.kanji: 毎朝7時5分に出勤します。
sentence.romaji: maiasa shichi ji go fun ni shukin shimasu
sentence.english: I go to work at 7:05 every morning.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsutomesaki

sentence.kanji: 私の勤め先にご連絡ください。
sentence.romaji: watashi no tsutomesaki ni gorenraku kudasai
sentence.english: Please contact my office.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsutome

sentence.kanji: 来月で勤めをやめます。
sentence.romaji: raigetsu de tsutome wo yamemasu
sentence.english: I'll quit my job next month.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kinmu

sentence.kanji: 私の一日の勤務時間は8時間です。
sentence.romaji: watashi no ichinichi no kinmujikan ha hachijikan desu
sentence.english: I work 8 hours a day.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jiseki

sentence.kanji: 彼は営業で実績を上げたんだ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha eigyou de jiseki wo ageta n da
sentence.english: He achieved good results working in sales.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kanjou

sentence.kanji: 感情とは複雑なものです。
sentence.romaji: kanjou to ha fukuzatsu na mono desu
sentence.english: Emotions are complex things.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jikan

sentence.romaji: kodomo ga arukihajimeta toki kodomo no seichou wo jikan shita
sentence.english: I got a real sense of my kid's growth when he started walking.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sainan

sentence.kanji: 旅先で思いがけない災難にあいました。
sentence.romaji: tabisaki de omoigakenai sainan ni aimashita
sentence.english: We encountered an unexpected misfortune on the trip.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's suigai

sentence.kanji: 水害でたくさんの人が家を失ったの。
sentence.romaji: suigai de takusan no hito ga ie wo ushinata no
sentence.english: A great number of people lost their homes due to flood damage.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yuugai

sentence.kanji: この材料は有害だよ。
sentence.romaji: kono zairyou ha yuugai da yo
sentence.english: This material is hazardous.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's higai

sentence.romaji: kare no ie ha taifuu no higai ni ata no
sentence.english: His house was damaged in the typhoon.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's arigatai

sentence.kanji: 彼の助けは本当に有り難いな。
sentence.romaji: kare no tasuke ha hontou ni arigatai na
sentence.english: His help is really welcome.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tounan

sentence.kanji: 昨夜、自転車の盗難にあったよ。
sentence.romaji: sakuya jitensha no tounan ni ata yo
sentence.english: My bicycle was stolen last night.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's wariai

sentence.kanji: 二つの薬品を1対3の割合で混ぜたんだ。
sentence.romaji: futatsu no yakuhin wo 1 tai 3 no wariai de mazeta n da
sentence.english: I mixed the two chemicals at a ratio of 1 to 3.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kakujitsu

sentence.kanji: 彼女が将来、大統領になることは確実です。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ga shourai daitouryou ni naru koto ha kakujitsu desu
sentence.english: It is certain that she will become the president in the future.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's aozora

sentence.kanji: 雲一つない青空ですね。
sentence.romaji: kumo hitotsu nai aozora desu ne
sentence.english: It is a cloudless blue sky.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's saigai

sentence.kanji: 地震は自然災害のひとつです。
sentence.romaji: jishin ha shizen saigai no hitotsu desu
sentence.english: Earthquakes are one type of natural disaster.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jinsei

sentence.kanji: 彼は自分の人生を振り返ったわ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha jibun no jinsei wo furikaeta wa
sentence.english: He looked back on his life.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seishin

sentence.kanji: 彼女は今、精神が不安定だ。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha ima seishin ga fuantei da
sentence.english: Now she is mentally unstable.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seisan

sentence.romaji: oriru eki de ryoukin wo seisan shite kudasai
sentence.english: Please adjust the fare at the station where you get off.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's genjitsu

sentence.kanji: 現実は予想より厳しかった。
sentence.romaji: genjitsu ha yosou yori kibishikata
sentence.english: The reality was harsher than we expected.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shizumaru

sentence.kanji: 台風が去って風が静まったね。
sentence.romaji: taifuu ga sate kaze ga shizumata ne
sentence.english: Because the typhoon has passed, the wind has dropped.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's reisei

sentence.kanji: 冷静に話し合いましょう。
sentence.romaji: reisei ni hanashiaimashou
sentence.english: Let's talk calmly.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's uraomote

sentence.kanji: シャツを裏表に着ていますよ。
sentence.romaji: shatsu wo uraomote ni kite imasu yo
sentence.english: You are wearing your shirt inside-out.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsumu

sentence.kanji: 車に荷物を積んでください。
sentence.romaji: kuruma ni nimotsu wo tsunde kudasai
sentence.english: Please load the luggage into the car.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jitsurei

sentence.kanji: 実例を使って説明してください。

sentence.english: Please explain by using an actual example.

sentence.romaji: mazu ha shougai wo torinozoite kara keikaku wo susumeyou
sentence.english: Let's get rid of the problem and then proceed with the plan.

sentence.kanji: 彼はとても表情が豊かですね。
sentence.romaji: kare ha totemo hyoujou ga yutaka desu ne
sentence.english: He's very expressive.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kujou

sentence.kanji: 店に苦情の電話をかけました。
sentence.romaji: mise ni kujou no denwa wo kakemashita
sentence.english: I phoned the shop to complain.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kinrou

sentence.kanji: 父は長い勤労生活を送ったんです。
sentence.romaji: chichi ha nagai kinrou seikatsu wo okuta n desu
sentence.english: My father had a long working career.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's konnan

sentence.kanji: 困難にあってもあきらめてはいけないよ。
sentence.romaji: konnan ni ate mo akiramete ha ikenai yo
sentence.english: You must not give up even if you encounter difficulties.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's norikoshi

sentence.romaji: norikoshi wo kikai de seisan shita no
sentence.english: I paid the excess fare at the machine.

sentence.english: We are making an effort to decrease pollution.

sentence.romaji: yato doryoku ga minorimashita
sentence.english: My effort has finally paid off.

sentence.romaji: saikin sanfujinka no fusoku ga mondai ni nate iru ne

sentence.kanji: 二人の実力は互角です。
sentence.romaji: futari no jitsuryoku ha gokaku desu
sentence.english: Their abilities are evenly matched.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's aijou

sentence.romaji: kodomo ha takusan no aijou ga hitsuyou desu
sentence.english: Children need plenty of love.

sentence.romaji: sengetsu musume ga tanjou shimashita
sentence.english: My daughter was born last month.

sentence.romaji: watashitachi ha banzai wo shite yorokobi wo arawashimashita
sentence.english: We expressed our joy by throwing our arms in the air.

sentence.romaji: kare ha kabu de zaisan no hanbun wo ushinata no
sentence.english: He lost half his assets in the stock market.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's songai

sentence.english: We can't live without oxygen.

sentence.romaji: kanojo ha totemo sunao de kawaii desu ne
sentence.english: She is very honest and cute.

sentence.romaji: mizu ha suiso to sanso de dekite imasu
sentence.english: Water is made of hydrogen and oxygen.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's subayai

sentence.kanji: 彼は素早くあたりを見回したの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha subayaku atari wo mimawashita no
sentence.english: He quickly looked around.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jitsuni

sentence.romaji: sakujitsu no konsa-to ha jitsuni subarashikata yo
sentence.english: Yesterday's concert was indeed wonderful.

sentence.romaji: niwa no ki ga akai mi wo tsuketa
sentence.english: The tree in the garden bore some red fruit.

sentence.romaji: kare ha kotobazukai ga sukoshi joseiteki da ne
sentence.english: His way of talking is a little feminine.

sentence.romaji: watashitachi ha doukyuusei desu
sentence.english: We're classmates.

sentence.english: Too much drinking harms your health.

sentence.romaji: ashi no kizu wo shoudoku shita wa

sentence.english: Drinking too much can poison your body.

sentence.english: Food poisoning broke out at the hotel.

sentence.romaji: sono koujou ha yuudokugasu wo dashite iru no ne
sentence.english: There are noxious fumes coming out of that factory.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seisho

sentence.english: Please make a clean copy of this letter.

sentence.kanji: レストランは清潔が第一です。
sentence.romaji: resutoran ha seiketsu ga daiichi desu
sentence.english: In restaurants cleanliness is the most important thing.

sentence.romaji: karada wo fuketsu ni shite iru to kayuku narimasu yo
sentence.english: If you don't keep your body clean, you're going to start itching.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's norikoeru

sentence.kanji: 彼は悲しみを乗り越えて強く生きた。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kanashimi wo norikoete tsuyoku ikita
sentence.english: He overcame his sadness and carried on determinedly.

sentence.romaji: kanwa jiten de kanji no imi wo shirabeta no
sentence.english: I looked up the meaning of a kanji in a Sino-Japanese dictionary.

sentence.kanji: 会社が倒産しました。
sentence.romaji: kaisha ga tousan shimashita
sentence.english: The company went bankrupt.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hinan

sentence.kanji: 危ないので避難してください。
sentence.romaji: abunai no de hinan shite kudasai
sentence.english: It's dangerous here, so please evacuate!

sentence.kanji: 彼に営業を妨害されました。
sentence.romaji: kare ni eigyou wo bougai saremashita
sentence.english: My business operations were thwarted by him.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seibutsu

sentence.romaji: umi no soko ni ha fushigi na seibutsu ga takusan iru yo
sentence.english: There are a lot of strange creatures at the bottom of the sea.

sentence.kanji: 素敵なプレゼントをありがとう。
sentence.romaji: suteki na purezento wo arigatou
sentence.english: Thank you for the wonderful gift.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's dansei

sentence.kanji: 彼は素敵な男性です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha suteki na dansei desu
sentence.english: He's a wonderful man.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jousei

sentence.kanji: 私は世界情勢を知るために毎日ニュースを見るわ。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha sekai jousei wo shiru tame ni mainichi nyu-su wo miru wa
sentence.english: I watch the news everyday to know about world affairs.

sentence.kanji: この棒は何に使うのですか。
sentence.romaji: kono bou ha nani ni tsukau no desu ka
sentence.english: What do you use this stick for?

sentence.kanji: 彼はとても誠実な人です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha totemo seijitsu na hito desu
sentence.english: He is a very honest person.

sentence.english: Grieving won't change anything.

sentence.english: Dogs are faithful to their owner.

sentence.english: Wheat is used in many foods.

sentence.english: Barley is one of the ingredients for beer.

sentence.romaji: kono hatake de ha mugi wo tsukute imasu
sentence.english: We're growing wheat in this field.

sentence.kanji: まな板が生臭いです。

sentence.english: The chopping board smells fishy.

sentence.english: A new family register is made when a couple marry.

sentence.romaji: shibafu ga yoku teire sarete imasu ne
sentence.english: The lawn is well-maintained.

sentence.english: A lot of people lost their lives in the disaster.

sentence.english: It's common in Japan for a married couple to have the same family name.

sentence.english: I dozed off and ending up going past my station.

sentence.romaji: karera ha suichoku no gake wo noborihajimeta no
sentence.english: They began to climb a vertical cliff.

sentence.english: We joined our hands together and prayed at the statue of Buddha.

sentence.romaji: anata no chosho wo haiken shimashita
sentence.english: I read your book.

sentence.english: My personality and my elder sister's are completely opposite.

sentence.english: It is difficult to revise the constitution.

sentence.english: The minister's assets were made public.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seishitsu

sentence.english: This dog has a calm nature.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seishun

sentence.romaji: kono kyoku wo kiku to seishun no koro wo omoidashimasu
sentence.english: When I hear this tune I am reminded of my youth.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shunbun

sentence.kanji: 春分の日は毎年3月20日頃です。
sentence.romaji: shunbun no hi ha maitoshi sangatsu hatsukagoro desu
sentence.english: The Vernal Equinox Day is about March 20th every year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shoujiru

sentence.kanji: 両者の間に摩擦が生じています。
sentence.romaji: ryousha no aida ni masatsu ga shoujite imasu
sentence.english: There is some friction between the two of them.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jitsuha

sentence.kanji: あれは実は私の勘違いでした。
sentence.romaji: are ha jitsuha watashi no kanchigai deshita
sentence.english: To tell the truth, that was my misunderstanding.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's umaretsuki

sentence.kanji: 彼女は生まれつき丈夫です。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha umaretsuki joubu desu
sentence.english: She is healthy by nature.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nuu

sentence.kanji: 彼女は子供のスカートを縫ったんだ。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha kodomo no suka-to wo nuta n da
sentence.english: She made a child's skirt.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shougai

sentence.kanji: 彼は80年の生涯を閉じました。
sentence.romaji: kare ha hachijuunen no shougai wo tojimashita
sentence.english: His life of 80 years came to a close.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsukemono

sentence.kanji: 祖母は漬け物を自分で作ります。
sentence.romaji: sobo ha tsukemono wo jibun de tsukurimasu
sentence.english: My grandmother makes her own pickles.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hanayaka

sentence.kanji: 彼女は華やかな女性ですね。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha hanayaka na josei desu ne
sentence.english: She's a gorgeous woman.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tenkin

sentence.kanji: 彼は大阪に転勤しました。
sentence.romaji: kare ha oosaka ni tenkin shimashita
sentence.english: He was transferred to Osaka.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jumyou

sentence.kanji: 亀の寿命は長いんだ。
sentence.romaji: kame no jumyou ha nagai n da
sentence.english: Turtles have long life spans.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsuba

sentence.kanji: 彼は地面に唾を吐いたよ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha jimen ni tsuba wo haita yo
sentence.english: He spat on the ground.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsukeru

sentence.kanji: 魚を味噌に漬けました。
sentence.romaji: sakana wo miso ni tsukemashita
sentence.english: I marinaded the fish in miso.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's waribashi

sentence.kanji: 彼女は割り箸を使わず、自分の箸を使うの。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha waribashi wo tsukawazu jibun no hashi wo tsukau no
sentence.english: She uses her own chopsticks rather than disposable ones.
